resources.string: MyWeather is an application that will help you to know the weather for the coming days, make a plan based on the weather and keep the memories of the best days on a walk! Share the good weather with your friends and go for a walk!
"- What the weather like today? - I don't know. But I know that you taped the screen times! "

"Hi, I'm the developer of the MyWeather app! Now I'm just starting to develop Android applications, but perhaps in the future I will achieve greater heights and become a professional).\nIf you want to support, write to me.
If you want to support, write to me.
Dear users, this application is created for those who love dogs. Here you can see information about different breeds, as well as add your pet.
Reachable at lightspeed, but you\'ll be a lot older
